question_text: What is the purpose of a shared responsibility model in cloud computing?
answer_options: To define the roles of hardware vendors and software developers
To separate tasks between cloud provider and customer
To identify the fastest cloud provider
To ensure that only the provider is responsible for data security
correct_answer: To separate tasks between cloud provider and customer
explanation: The shared responsibility model clarifies who is responsible for which parts of a cloud deployment â€” the provider or the customer.
